comments.raw_text: Error messages in View Source are attached to text highlights. Since there's no text to highlight for the end of file, EOF-triggered tree builder errors aren't reported. Should do better than that.
comments.text: Error messages in View Source are attached to text highlights. Since there's no text to highlight for the end of file, EOF-triggered tree builder errors aren't reported. Should do better than that.
comments.author: hsivonen@mozilla.com
comments.creator: hsivonen@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text:
Bulk-downgrade of unassigned, >=5 years untouched DOM/Storage bugs' priority and severity.

If you have reason to believe this is wrong, please write a comment and ni :jstutte.
